description: "Navigation chart of part of the South China Sea leading to the eastern entrance of the Singapore Strait. Features bathymetry (sea depth), anchor points, shoals and other obstructions, landmark hills, and detailed explanatory notes."
title: "A plan of Soundings from Pulo Aor to the Southward and outside of the Reef off Point Romania to the entrance of Sincapour Strait with the Land adjacent and the relative positions of the Hills & c"
